title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: A year after the killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO, Luigi Mangione fights to suppress key evidence

items.title: Australia wants to end the era of kids on social media with international ban hailed as ‘first domino’ in global movement
